title: When writing a story in first person, is it better to use past or present tense? - Quora

response.answer_text: I love to write in the first person present tense, but it is not always easy. I have an article on this on my website that might help. However, it has to be said that not all readers like to read in first person present tense. Most get used to it after a while, but find it strange to start with. The real answers to your question, is to try both and see which fits the characters/story best. Hope this helps. Nick.
